definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

sentences.english: Most snare drums are constructed in plies that are heat- and compression-moulded into a cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 小鼓大多是建于铺层是热和压缩成圆筒成型。

sentences.english: He then sat at the drum and played while the stage hands brought him a snare drum.
sentences.chinese: 当助手给他一个小鼓时，他就做下来打起鼓来。

sentences.english: Snare drums may be made from various wood, metal, or acrylic materials.
sentences.chinese: 小鼓，可制成各种木材，金属，压克力材料。

sentences.english: Each dancer is highly skillful, with seven small drums tied on him.
sentences.chinese: 表演者技艺高超，一名演员可身挂七面小鼓。

definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
to beat a drum/to play a drum/(fig.) to feel nervous
waist drum/waist-drum dance (Han ethnic group folk dance)
Tongluo or Tunglo township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
bamboo clapper boards used in folk theater
Dongdong, cheerleading mascot of 2008 Beijing Olympics
